channel.title: Character rollback glitch
channel.description: Some users on my server are having this glitch where when they logout the automatically go back to where they were before,(like a rollback kinda) so say u log in at home, then u go to train and kill some monsters get some gold then u log out when u log back in you will be at home with no gold and no exp :(

item.title: Character rollback glitch
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“co pked, post:1, topic:299473”]Some users on my server are having this glitch where when they logout the automatically go back to where they were before,(like a rollback kinda)
so say u log in at home, then u go to train and kill some monsters get some gold then u log out when u log back in you will be at home with no gold and no exp :([/quote]
Make the server save when you hit thelogout button

Read full topic
